bam.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used to show that something happens quickly
bam.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: He made a run for it and, bam, they shot him in the leg.
bam.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used to show that something has hit something else
bam.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: used to make the sound of a gun
